betterquesting:10.desc:8:
Research Table Specialization

By placing certain specific blocks in a 9x9x3 area around the Research Table and selecting them before starting research, you can increase the probability of drawing specific research cards. However, this will consume a small amount of Inspiration. The blocks are as follows:

Bookshelf: Increases the probability of drawing the "Annotations" card.
Enchanting Table: Increases the probability of drawing the "Research Enchantment" card.
Beacon: Increases the probability of drawing the "Aura Influence" card.
Arcane Workbench: Increases the probability of drawing "Refinement Science" related cards.
Crucible: Increases the probability of drawing "Alchemy" related cards.
Core Infusion Table: Increases the probability of drawing "Mysticism" related cards.
Golem Workshop: Increases the probability of drawing "Golemancy" related cards.
Rune Matrix: Increases the probability of drawing "Arcane Enchantment" related cards.
Brain in a Jar: Increases the probability of drawing the "Dark Whispers" card.
Portal: Increases the probability of drawing the "Otherworldly Echoes" card.
Rune Stone: Increases the probability of drawing the "Runic Studies" card.
Astral Research: After completing the "Astral Research" study, increases the probability of drawing the "Astral Research" card.
Inspiration Engine (Source > 5): Based on remaining source material (5-15), it increases the probability of drawing 1–3 "Gaining Inspiration" cards.
Madness Engine (Source > 5): Based on remaining source material (5-15), it increases the probability of drawing 1–3 "Gaining Madness" cards.
Brain Jar Rift: Increases the probability of drawing the "Brain Jar Rift" card.
Rift Monitoring Device: Increases the probability of drawing the "Rift Monitoring Device" card.
ME Controller: Increases the probability of drawing "Energy Studies" cards.
